member.name: M:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.WriteID3v11
member.summary: This method writes the data. If the file is in use it will throw an IOException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.Title
member.summary: sets or reads the title. If there's a size over 30 characters, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.Artist
member.summary: sets or reads the artist. If there's a size over 30 characters, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.Album
member.summary: sets or reads the album. If there's a size over 30 characters, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.Year
member.summary: sets or reads the year. If there's a size over 4 characters, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.Comment
member.summary: sets or reads the comment. If there's a size over 28 characters, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.TitleNumber
member.summary: sets or reads the title number. If the value is greater than 255 or smaller than 0 or the value is not a number, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.GenreID
member.summary: sets or reads the GenreID. If the value is greater than 255 or smaller than 0 or the value is not a number, it throws a FormatException

member.name: P:id3v1Tagger.Tagger.GenreName
member.summary: reads the genreID and returns the genre name as string. If theres a ID over 147 it return an empty string

member.name: T:id3v1Tagger.GenreDB
member.summary: Central genre enumeration. It raises clarity and reduces ram usage
